pullrequest.title: Use direct API call to Scene::SetPoseMsg to update poses from physics for server-side rendering

content.raw:
Sorry I just looked at this PR again and realized it doesn't go all the way as to implement the lock-stepping, and that's the part which I think should be optional. I'm ok with the API call being the only way that the server scene is updated on Gazebo 11.

In fact, what's preventing us from going with the "When ready to use the direct API" bits now? Is it just a matter of doing more testing?
